categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic regiments
Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic Special Forces units

nodes.text: Recon was one of the two initial regiments, alongside Combat, that formed the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Special Forces when it was created. Over the course of several missions, SpecForce was reorganized into its more recognizable form of several smaller specialist units, such as Infiltrators or Wilderness Fighters.
